name: "Raph"
introduction: Comte George Raphal Bthenod de Montbressieux, known under the pseudonym "Raph" (born 8 February 1910 in Buenos Aires, Buenos Aries Province, Argentina  died 16 June 1994 in Neuilly-sur-Marne, Seine-Saint-Denis, le-de-France, France) was a Argentine-born French racing driver who raced pre-Formula One.  He is sometimes listed under the name "de la Casas", his mother's name.
